amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 451 from the bill, which authorizes the Essential Air Service.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 112 printed in Part A of House Report 115-650 to strike Section 451 from the bill, which authorizes the Essential Air Service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 113 - 293 (Roll no. 162).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. McClintock.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
